Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.planning.ldm.policy

Interface Summary
RuleParameter A RuleParameter is generic object containing a parameter value Values may be one of several types: INTEGER - Integer value type (within given bounds) DOUBLE - Double value type (within given bounds) STRING - String value type LONG - Long value type (within given bounds) ENUMERATION - Enumeration value type (String from given list) BOOLEAN - Boolean value type CLASS - Java class value type (implementing given interface) KEY - Set of String values (with default) indexed off a key RANGE - Set of values (String or RuleParameter) (with default) indexed from a list of integer ranges
 

Class Summary
BooleanRuleParameter A BooleanRuleParameter is a RuleParameter that contains a single true or false value
ClassRuleParameter A ClassRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with specified/protected Java interface/class that returns an Class that implements that interface or extends that class
DoubleRuleParameter An DoubleRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with specified/protected double bounds that returns a Double
EnumerationRuleParameter An EnumerationRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with specified/protected string selections that returns a string
IntegerRuleParameter An IntegerRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with specified/protected integer bounds that returns an Integer
KeyRuleParameter An KeyRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with a list of key/value pairs and a default value.
KeyRuleParameterEntry Simple entry for KeyRuleParameters : holds a key and a value
LongRuleParameter An LongRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with specified/protected long bounds that returns an Long
Policy Policy is a class that contains RuleParameters
PredicateRuleParameter An PredicateRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with a UnaryPredicate as its value.
RangeRuleParameter An RangeRuleParameter is a RuleParameter with a list of integer-range delineated values and a default value.
RangeRuleParameterEntry Simple entry for RangeRuleParameters : holds int min/max range and a value
StringRuleParameter An StringRuleParameter is a RuleParameter that returns an arbitrary string
 

Exception Summary
RuleParameterIllegalValueException A RuleParameterException is an exception to be generated when setting a parameter with values illegal for that parameter instance.
